title: Technology Education Based on RFID and Mixed Reality: Mobile Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic electronics and programming
context.additional_context: A practice-oriented training course for current professionals combining RFID hardware with mixed reality (MR) software

learning_goals: Learners can visually explain the operating principles and data flow of RFID systems in a mixed-reality environment.
Learners can perform RFID-based IoT system design simulations using mobile devices with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can autonomously create AR/MR modules for technical education using mixed-reality content authoring tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
